commodities.tests
Class Recommendation

java.lang.Object
  commodities.tests.Recommendation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
public class Recommendation
extends Object
implements Comparable

Recommendation contains a test's recommendation on what action to take with a commodity (buy/sell).

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

Constructor Detail

Recommendation

public Recommendation(String testName,
                      int buySell)
Create a recommendation for the given test.

Parameters:
testName - the name of the test to use in displays
buySell - the buy/sell recommendation for this test

Recommendation

public Recommendation(String testName,
                      int buySell,
                      double stoploss)
Create a recommendation for the given test with a stoploss amount. The stoploss amount assumes a preferred loss amount of $0. The actual stoploss amount should be adjusted accordingly. Even if the recommendation is no action, the stoploss should still indicate an appropriate exit price.

Parameters:
testName - the name of the test to use in displays
buySell - the buy/sell recommendation for this test
stoploss - the stoploss recommendation
Method Detail

getTestName

public String getTestName()
Get the test name.

public int getBuySellRecommendation()
Get the recommendation.

Returns:
the recommendation

getBuySellRecommendLabel

public String getBuySellRecommendLabel()
Get the label of the buy/sell recommendation.

Returns:
the label used for the recommendation

getStoploss

public double getStoploss()
Get the recommended stoploss price. This amount takes into consideration a preferred stoploss cost of $0. The final stoploss amount should be adjusted accordingly.

Returns:
the stoploss amount
